Why this campaign matters

The campaign aims to create and maintain a campus environment that is safe, respectful, and free from any form of sexual harassment. This is fundamental for the well-being and mental health of every member of the community.

Sexual harassment undermines the dignity of individuals. By standing against such behavior, the campaign upholds the principle that every person, regardless of gender, should be treated with respect and dignity.

A zero-tolerance approach to sexual harassment fosters an inclusive atmosphere where all individuals, irrespective of their gender or background, feel welcomed, valued, and able to contribute fully to the academic and social life of the campus.

The campaign sends a clear message that survivors of sexual harassment will be supported and believed. It encourages individuals to come forward, seek help, and report incidents without fear of retaliation.

In summary, the "Zero Tolerance for Sexual Harassment" campaign is not only a response to legal and ethical obligations but also a proactive initiative to shape a campus culture that values respect, inclusivity, and the protection of every individual's right to a safe educational environment.
